code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../apis";import{LIMIT}from"../../../constant";export var yourArticles=function yourArticles(token,offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/feed?limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var globalArticles=function globalArticles(token,offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles?limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var globalArticlesNoToken=function globalArticlesNoToken(offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles?limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});};
